Play.Header: DAL wins toss, elects to Receive, and WAS elects to defend the South goal.
3-N.Novak kicks 64 yards from WAS 30 to DAL 6. 28-T.Thompson to DAL 30 for 24 yards (21-S.Taylor). Return left side of the field.
Dallas Cowboys at 15:00, (1st play from scrimmage 14:56)

Play.PlayDescription: (14:56) 21-J.Jones left end to DAL 33 for 3 yards (56-L.Arrington).
(14:18) 11-D.Bledsoe pass to 83-T.Glenn to DAL 39 for 6 yards (21-S.Taylor). Quick out right sideline.
(13:32) 11-D.Bledsoe pass to 88-B.Pierce pushed ob at DAL 49 for 10 yards (53-M.Washington). Play action pass play; ball caught right flat. This is Pierce's first career pass reception.
(13:03) 21-J.Jones left end to WAS 48 for 3 yards (21-S.Taylor).

PENALTY on WAS-27-W.Harris, Illegal Contact, 5 yards, enforced at WAS 40 - No Play.
Timeout #1 by DAL at 11:36.

(11:02) 21-J.Jones right tackle to WAS 31 for 3 yards (96-C.Griffin).
(10:20) 21-J.Jones right tackle to WAS 22 for 9 yards (41-M.Bowen). Prioleau of Washington was shaken up on the play.
(9:44) 11-D.Bledsoe pass to 81-P.Price to WAS 23 for -1 yards (21-S.Taylor). Quick out right sideline.

(9:06) 11-D.Bledsoe pass incomplete to 82-J.Witten. Pass thrown right sideline; Washington was the closest defender on the play. Washington's Prioleau has suffered a pulled hamstring and will not return.
(9:03) (Shotgun) 11-D.Bledsoe pass incomplete to 83-T.Glenn. Curl left side; Rogers closest defender.

(13:02) 11-D.Bledsoe pass to 83-T.Glenn for 70 yards, TOUCHDOWN. Flee-flicker; handoff to Jones who tossed it back to Bledsoe for deep throw to Glenn right side of the field. This is the longest scoring pass play by the Cowboys since Quincy Carter hit Antonio Bryant for a 78-yard TD pass at Arizona during the 2002 season.
2-J.Cortez extra point is GOOD, Center-46-J.Condo, Holder-9-T.Romo.

(:26) (Shotgun) 11-D.Bledsoe Aborted. 52-A.Johnson FUMBLES at DAL 15, recovered by DAL-11-D.Bledsoe at DAL 15. 11-D.Bledsoe pass to 83-T.Glenn to DAL 41 for 20 yards (24-S.Springs).
(:15) 11-D.Bledsoe spiked the ball to stop the clock.
(:09) (Shotgun) 11-D.Bledsoe pass incomplete to 84-P.Crayton. Pass thrown left sideline; incomplete at the Washington 32.
(:04) (Shotgun) 11-D.Bledsoe pass to 21-J.Jones to 50 for 9 yards. Lateral to 83-T.Glenn to WAS 43 for 7 yards (23-O.Stoutmire).
